pageContent.title: Introduction 2
pageContent.descriptionText:
You and Your CustomerYou believe that the HCPs at Sunnydale Psychiatry are now in the "deciding to trial" phase of the prescribing cycle, in which the practice is considering adding your product as a more common atypical adjunctive treatment for depression. You have helped Dr. Bennett and Dr. Hayes to identify and work through the fair balance of prescribing your product, and you have assisted them in carefully evaluating all of their options. Things are going well, and you will be checking in this week to see what Dr. Bennett needs to move forward. You also need to work with the staff to educate them on your product.

Please press CONTINUE to begin the simulation
